note.p: Dispenser. Worked as dispenser at the West Riding Lunatic Asylum in Wakefield, Yorkshire, in the 1870s. Emigrated to North America, 1890. In the oil business in Portland, Oregon, 1910.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archive: Public Record Office RG10/4619/44/12), 1881 (RG11/4575/129/6)
United States Federal Census 1910 (Portland 9, Multnomah, Oregon 213/2B) (Ancestry.com, accessed 1 June 2020)
